sources.pages/chat/components/chatListItem/chatL:
.chat-list-item
  border-top: 1px solid #EAEAEA
.chat-item-wrap
  display: flex
  padding: 12px 0
.chat-item-avatar
  width: 57px
  margin-right: 10px
.chat-item-content-wrap
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column
  width: 233px
.chat-item-info, .chat-item-content
  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between
.chat-item-author, .chat-item-text
  flex-grow: 1
.chat-item-author
  font-size: 0.8125rem
  font-weight: 600
.chat-item-text
  width: 193px
  font-size: 0.75rem
  font-weight: 500
  color: #999999
.chat-item-text-self
  color: #000000
.chat-item-time, .chat-item-unread
  width: 40px
.chat-item-unread > span
  width: 20px
  height: 20px
  margin: 0 auto
  border-radius: 100%
  display: flex
  justify-content: center
  align-items: center
  color: #ffffff
  background-color: #3369F3
.chat-item-time > span
  display: flex
  justify-content: center
  align-items: center
  font-size: 0.5625rem
  color: #999999
sources.pages/chat/components/commonMessage/comm:
.common-message
  position: relative
  width: fit-content
  max-width: 400px
  min-width: 114px
  padding: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
.common-message.is-time
  align-self: center
  color: #999999
.common-message.is-other
  background-color: #f8f8f8
  border-radius: 0 10px 10px 10px
.common-message.is-image
  background-color: #ffffff
  border-radius: 0
.common-message.is-you
  align-self: flex-end
  background-color: #e4edfd
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 10px
.common-message-text
  margin-bottom: 15px
.common-message-info
  display: flex
  justify-content: flex-end
.status.is-seen
  color: #3369f3
.status.right, .status.left
  position: absolute
.status.left
  left: 54px
.status.right
  left: 54px
sources.pages/chat/chat.sass:
@import "components/chatListItem/chatListItem"
@import "components/commonMessage/commonMessage"
.chat-wrap
  display: flex
  max-width: 1280px
  margin: 0 auto
.chat-wrap > section
  height: 100vh
.sidebar
  width: 310px
  padding: 10px
  font-size: 0.75rem
  background-color: #FBFBFB
.sidebar-header
  padding-bottom: 14px
  height: 100px
.sidebar-profile
  display: flex
  justify-content: flex-end
  align-items: center
  height: 47px
.chat-list
  min-height: calc(100vh - 110px)
  max-height: calc(100vh - 110px)
  overflow-y: auto
.link-profile
  color: #999999
  font-size: 0.75rem
.message
  flex-grow: 1
.input-search
  width: 100%
  padding: 10px
  background: #EFEFEF
  border-radius: 5px
  border: none
label[for='message']
  display: flex
  flex-grow: 1
input[name='message']
  width: 100%
  background-color: #EFEFEF
  border-radius: 20px
  border: none
  padding: 10px 20px
  font-size: 0.75rem
  color: #999999
.btn
  &-message-box
    margin: 0 10px
.message
  padding: 10px 20px
.message-header
  height: 44px
  border-bottom: 1px solid #EAEAEA
.message-header-wrap
  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between
.current-message-author
  display: flex
.author-avatar
  height: 34px
  width: 34px
  margin-right: 10px
.author-name
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column
  justify-content: center
.messanger
  font-size: 0.75rem
  max-height: calc(100vh - 108px)
  min-height: calc(100vh - 108px)
  overflow-y: auto
.messanger-list
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column
.message-box
  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between
  height: 54px
  padding: 10px 0
  border-top: 1px solid #EAEAEA
.btn-message-box.send
  width: 28px
  height: 28px
  align-self: center
  border-radius: 100%
  background-color: #3369f3
.btn-message-box.attach
  align-self: center
  width: 32px
  height: 32px
  background-color: inherit
  background-image: url('../../images/attach.png')
.message-nav
  position: relative
.set-user-modal
  display: none
  flex-direction: column
  position: absolute
  right: -5px
  top: 52px
  width: 210px
  padding: 15px
  box-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14)
  border-radius: 12px
  background-color: #ffffff
  z-index: 100
  font-size: 0.75rem
.set-user-modal.active
  display: flex
.btn-set-user
  position: relative
  width: 25px
  height: 25px
  background-color: #f5f5f5
  border-radius: 50%
  &:hover
    background-color: #999999
.btn-set-user > span
  position: absolute
  left: 11px
  width: 3px
  height: 3px
  background-image: url(../../images/add_user.png)
.btn-set-user.top
  top: 5px
.btn-set-user.center
  top: 11px
.btn-set-user.bottom
  bottom: 5px
.set-user-link
  text-decoration: none
  color: #000000
  display: block
  padding-left: 37px
.set-user-link.add
  margin-bottom: 20px
.arrow-right-4
  margin-top: 3px
  width: 20px
  height: 20px
  cursor: pointer
.arrow-right-4 polygon
  fill: #ffffff
  transition: fill 0.5s ease-out
